title: Pluralsight - Java Swing Development Using NetBeans
description:
Pluralsight - Java Swing Development Using NetBeans
===================================================
Video: WVC1 1024x768 15.00fps 384kbps [Raw Video 1]
Audio: Windows Media Audio 48000Hz stereo 192kbps [Raw Audio 0]
Exercise Files Included



Learn to develop lightweight, cross-platform desktop applications using Java Swing. Utilize the NetBeans Integrated Development Environment (IDE) to simplify building Graphical User Interfaces (GUI) and screen layouts.
